name: Beast Feast
description:
**originally made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare Jam 24**

Straight outta Underground Pixel comes a new arcade game, the likes of which you've never seen before! Beast Feast stars an adorable little monster who must eat as much meat as possible, which is dropped by the enemies that he blows up with his egg bombs. Reach 50 on your food counter to evolve to your most fearsome form to win, and try your hardest to get there in the lowest time possible!
